v0.9.0.1 - Critical Bug Fixes & XP System Overhaul
[CRITICAL XP FIXES] - Fixed 0 XP in muster reports - all activities now properly grant enlistment XP for rank progression - Fixed combat XP not tracked - killing enemies now awards tier-scaled XP (higher tier = more XP) - Added missing XP rewards to all 85 order events across 11 order types - Order events: 10-32 XP per event (scales with difficulty and skill checks) - Camp activities: 8-25 XP (training, self-treatment, muster interactions) - Combat kills: Tier-scaled using native formula (T5 elite = 3.5x more XP than T1 recruit) - Failed skill checks now award 50% XP (learn from mistakes) - All XP sources tracked and displayed in muster period summary breakdown
[QUARTERMASTER FIXES] - Fixed Quartermaster showing vanilla companion recruitment dialogue (changed Occupation to Soldier) - Fixed Quartermaster dialogue breaking with 'custom_line_a to d Error' messages - Fixed supply inquiry closing conversation instead of showing supply report - Added fallback dialogue system to ensure QM always works even with corrupted installations
[DIAGNOSTICS & VALIDATION] - Enhanced conflict detection system to verify mod installation integrity - Added module health check that detects missing/corrupt JSON and XML files - Added runtime catalog status verification to confirm content loaded successfully - Added validation tool checks for missing XP in order events - Improved diagnostic logging for user bug reports with installation path detection
This update resolves widespread reports of '0 XP in muster reports' and Quartermaster dialogue errors.
